name: Afrojack
description: '''Nick Leonardus van de Wall'''{{family name footnote|lang=Dutch|van de Wall|Wall}} ({{IPA|nl|ˈnɪk leːjoːˈnɑrdʏs fɑn də ˈʋɑl|lang}};{{efn|In isolation, ''van'' is pronounced {{IPA|nl|vɑn|}}.}} born 9 September 1987), known professionally as '''Afrojack''' (stylized in [[all caps]]), is a Dutch DJ, record producer and remixer. In 2007, he founded the record label Wall Recordings; his debut album ''[[Forget the World (Afrojack album)|Forget the World]]'' was released in 2014. Afrojack regularly features as one of the ten best artists in the Top 100 DJs published by ''[[DJ Mag]]''. He is also the CEO of [[LDH (company)|LDH]] Europe.
